import axios from 'axios'; function FormAccount() { const [rows, setRows] = useState(""); handleButtonClick = () => { axios.get('/account').then((response) => { this.setRows({ rows: response.data }); }); }; return (
{this.rows.map(account => {customer.CustomerId} {customer.Name} {customer.Country} )}
); } export default FormAccount;
